creators.author: P. Van den Berg, from Dutch

layout.singingstanza: We praise Thee, glor -- ious Fa -- ther, As ob -- jects of Thy grace, Who for Thine own heart's plea -- sure Are now be -- fore Thy face: Thy sons marked out for glo -- ry Known from e -- ter -- ni -- ty With Christ Thy Well- be -- lov -- ed, Ob -- ject su -- preme to Thee.

lyrics.stanza: We praise Thee, glorious Father, As objects of Thy grace, Who for Thine own heart's pleasure Are now before Thy face: Thy sons marked out for glory Known from eternity With Christ Thy Well-beloved, Object supreme to Thee.

Who else but Thee, O Father, Could in Thine only Son So bless us with Thy Spirit, And have us for Thine own? Soon shall we be forever With Christ in glory; then We'll shine in His blest image Eternally, Amen!
